docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Lee Atwater, who used to revel in making his political enemies squirm, who used to jog with the President and spar with the press, now says the moment when he feels most in control is when he goes to the hospital for the daily treatment to fight the tumor in his brain.

headline.main: G.O.P. Chief's Enemy Is Now Illness
